architectural_notes: If implementing a download button, restrict access (auth/admin-only) and plan to remove/disable it after download; consider using a backend export endpoint to package files (e.g., ZIP) rather than exposing raw directories.

existing_features.title: Implement the currently-empty frontend component `frontend/src/components/ProjectZipDownload.tsx` as a temporary admin-only UI that lets a user download the Project ZIP and then remove/disable it after download.

Wire the temporary Project ZIP download UI into the app in a way that does not reintroduce the removed download section on the public landing page (hero), while still allowing the user to access it when needed.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a temporary download button/export mechanism so user can download all website/project files (then remove the button)
Implement a backend mechanism to store, serve, and delete a single Project ZIP archive so the user can download all project files and then remove the archive afterward.

projectName: Add temporary Project ZIP download button with backend export and removal
